hero.title: HEAVY EQUIPMENT REPAIR SERVICES
hero.subtitle: Quality service and repair of heavy equipment, including diagnostics, parts replacement and equipment setup.
hero.imageAlt: Heavy equipment and diesel engine repair

sections.divorceDesc: Professional repair of excavator-loaders of all brands: JCB, Komatsu, CAT, Volvo, Case and others. Mobile brigades with on-site diagnostics and repair of your equipment.
sections.pretensionDescription: Full range of metalworking services: turning and milling, heat treatment, boring, manufacturing of bushings, pins and seals. Metal product restoration and overlay welding.
sections.businessDescription: Wide range of parts, oils, filters and consumables for heavy equipment in stock and on order. Flexible prices, discounts, fast delivery throughout Kazakhstan.
sections.pricingSubtitle: We offer a wide range of services for heavy equipment and diesel engine repair.
sections.processTitle: Heavy Equipment Repair: From Diagnostics to Delivery
sections.processSubtitle: We perform a complete cycle of heavy equipment repair work.

step1.title: Diagnostics
step1.desc: We perform initial diagnostics to determine the condition of heavy equipment.

step2.title: Repair
step2.desc: We perform necessary repair work, whether it's major overhaul or minor repairs.

step3.title: Delivery
step3.desc: We do a final check and deliver the completed work to the customer.

service1.title: Excavator-Loader Repair
service1.desc: Comprehensive repair of excavator-loaders of all brands: JCB, Komatsu, CAT, Volvo, Terex, Case, John Deere, New Holland, Hidromek and others. Diagnostics, hydraulic, engine, transmission repair.

service2.title: Mobile Repair Crews
service2.desc: Specialists visit your site for equipment diagnostics and repair. Prompt troubleshooting without transporting equipment to service. We work throughout Kazakhstan.

service3.title: Boring and Hole Restoration
service3.desc: Professional boring of worn holes for bushings. Restoration of mounting locations in frames, booms, buckets. High-precision equipment and experienced craftsmen.

service4.title: Manufacturing Bushings, Pins, Seals
service4.desc: Production of bushings, pins, seals and other parts by sample or drawings. In stock and made to order. Quality materials and strict dimensional control.

service5.title: Welding and Overlay of Metal Structures
service5.desc: Welding work of any complexity: repair of frames, booms, buckets, metal structures. Overlay of worn parts to restore geometry and increase service life.

service6.title: Cardan Shaft Repair
service6.desc: Diagnostics, repair and balancing of heavy equipment cardan shafts. Replacement of crosses, bearings, spline joints. Quality and durability guarantee.

service1.title: Turning Work
service1.description: Turning of parts of any complexity: shafts, bushings, pins, axles. Manufacturing by drawings and samples. High-precision equipment for metal processing.

service2.title: Milling Work
service2.description: Milling of flat and shaped surfaces, grooves, channels. Manufacturing of parts with complex geometry. We work with various metals and alloys.

service3.title: Metal Heat Treatment
service3.description: Heat treatment of parts to increase hardness and wear resistance. Hardening, tempering, normalization. Observance of technological regimes for each metal type.

service4.title: Band Saw Metal Cutting
service4.description: Cutting of metal products and blanks on band saw machine. Precise and even cuts without material deformation. Various metal sizes.

service1.title: Heavy Equipment Parts
service1.description: Wide range of original and aftermarket parts for excavator-loaders of all brands. In stock and on order with fast delivery throughout Kazakhstan.

service2.title: Oils and Lubricants
service2.description: Motor, hydraulic and transmission oils from leading manufacturers. Oil selection according to equipment manufacturer recommendations. Certified products.

service3.title: Filters and Consumables
service3.description: High quality oil, air, fuel and hydraulic filters. Consumables for maintenance. Always in stock at warehouse.

service4.title: Flexible Prices and Delivery
service4.description: We provide discounts to regular customers and for bulk purchases. Fast delivery throughout Kazakhstan. We work with major transport companies.

adv1.title: Experienced Specialists
adv1.desc: Our craftsmen have many years of experience in repairing heavy equipment of all brands and models.

adv2.title: Mobile Crews
adv2.desc: Site visit for diagnostics and on-site equipment repair. We work throughout Kazakhstan.

adv3.title: Modern Equipment
adv3.desc: We use high-precision equipment for turning, milling and welding work.

adv4.title: Parts in Stock
adv4.desc: Large warehouse of original and aftermarket parts. Fast delivery throughout Kazakhstan.

adv5.title: Flexible Prices
adv5.desc: We provide discounts to regular customers and for large orders. Transparent pricing.

adv6.title: Quality Guarantee
adv6.desc: We guarantee all completed work and installed parts.

contact.subtitle: Choose convenient way
contact.desc: Contact us in any convenient way for consultation on repairing your heavy equipment
